changelog.zh:
- 修复：还原鼠标悬停控制栏显示逻辑，解决快速划过时的异常行为
- 优化：播放列表解析超时时间从30秒减少到3秒，提高响应速度
- 改进：播放列表解析错误处理，使用本地化错误消息
- 优化：代码格式化和结构改进，提高代码可读性
- 修复：自动刷新服务错误处理，增强稳定性
- 改进：首页数据加载和错误提示优化
changelog.en:
- Fixed: Reverted mouse hover control bar display logic to fix abnormal behavior during quick mouse movements
- Optimized: Reduced playlist parsing timeout from 30s to 3s for better responsiveness
- Improved: Playlist parsing error handling with localized error messages
- Optimized: Code formatting and structure improvements for better readability
- Fixed: Auto-refresh service error handling for enhanced stability
- Improved: Home screen data loading and error message optimization
